column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came highly recommended and not disappointed. Portions are large
column2: family style salad was more than our party of 4 could handle with an appetizer and the large Malnati's. We took half the pizza home. The BBQ salad had good flavor but the bacon bits and tortillas added too much crunch and became tiring to eat. Pizza was very good! Came early for lunch 11:30 and sat down right away
column4: a ton of people waiting in line.
